comments:
Security exception when calling ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader() with Java 2 
security enabled.

For example, when line 128 of 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.impl.EventXMLFileEventFactoryHomeImpl 
generates a security exception when calling ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader() 
with Java 2 security enabled:

java.security.AccessControlException: access denied 
(java.lang.RuntimePermission getClassLoader)
       at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission
(AccessControlContext.java(Compiled Code))
       at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(AccessController.java
(Compiled Code))
       at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(SecurityManager.java
(Compiled Code))
       at com.ibm.ws.security.core.SecurityManager.checkPermission
(SecurityManager.java(Compiled Code))
       at java.lang.ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader(ClassLoader.java(Compiled 
Code))
       at 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.impl.EventXMLFileEventFactoryHomeImpl.crea
teContentHandler(EventXMLFileEventFactoryHomeImpl.java:128)
       at 
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.impl.AbstractEventFactoryHome.getEventFact
ory(AbstractEventFactoryHome.java:111)
       at com.ibm.ws.logging.cbe.EventFactoryHelper.getEventFactory
(EventFactoryHelper.java:118)
       at com.ibm.ws.logging.WsLoggerConfigurator.configureLogger
(WsLoggerConfigurator.java:248)
       at com.ibm.ws.logging.WsLoggerFactoryImpl.createWsLogger
(WsLoggerFactoryImpl.java:76)
       at com.ibm.ws.bootstrap.RASDelegator.createWsLogger(RASDelegator.java:76)
       at com.ibm.ws.bootstrap.WsLogManager.getLogger(WsLogManager.java:72)
       at java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(Logger.java:242)

NOTE: Ensure all calls to ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader() in all Haydes 
plugins are contained in a doPriv block.
Code checked-in to HEAD on July 15, 2004.
Verified in Toronto's 20040715_1621 (HEAD) build on July 19, 2004.
